Hello,${ctx.get('owner_name')}
This is an automated notification alerting you that your rebate form has been successfully submitted. For your records, your submitted rebate form has been attached to this email.
You will be notified within 1-3 weeks from submission date on whether or not you have fulfilled the 6 month requirement and are qualified for the rebate.
If your rebate is approved, the rebate will be deposited to the bank account you provided within 7-14 business days from approval date. If your rebate has been rejected, your sales agent will notify you as well as go through the reasons why you did not qualify for the rebate. If your rebate has been approved but you have yet to receive your rebate after 14 business days, please call us at 470-485-1888, ext 204, or message us on WeChat via WeChat ID: ZBS_LELE.
Thank you,
ZBS POS
